TheAlgorithms /

      Python---All Algorithms implemented in Python

vinta /

      awesome-python---A curated list of awesome Python frameworks, libraries, software and resources

trekhleb /

      learn-python---📚 Playground and cheatsheet for learning Python. Collection of Python scripts that are split by topics and contain code examples with explanations.

zhiwehu /

      Python-programming-exercises---100+ Python challenging programming exercises

tuvtran /

      project-based-learning---Curated list of project-based tutorials

upptime /

      upptime---⬆️ Uptime monitor and status page powered by GitHub

jerry-git /

      learn-python3---Jupyter notebooks for teaching/learning Python 3

mRs- /

      Black-Friday-Deals---Black Friday Deals for macOS / iOS Software & Books

GoogleLLP /

      SuperMarket---设计精良的网上商城系统，包括前端、后端、数据库、负载均衡、数据库缓存等，使用SpringCloud框架，基于Java开发。该项目可部署到服务器上，不断完善中……

ZecOps /

      FreeTheSandbox_LPE_POC_13.7---Jailbreak for iOS 13.7 and earlier

tensorflow /

      tensorflow---An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone

AMAI-GmbH /

      AI-Expert-Roadmap---Roadmap to becoming an Artificial Intelligence Expert in 2020

LukeSmithxyz /

      mutt-wizard---A system for automatically configuring mutt and isync with a simple interface and safe passwords
